Method.name: TestOnNew
Method.Implementation: s init="", init("Name")="Test", init("Comment")="Test Store" s depot=##class(Store.Depot).%New(.init) d $$$AssertEquals(depot.Name,$g(init("Name")),"Назначение Name через конструктор") d $$$AssertEquals(depot.Comment,$g(init("Comment")),"Назначение Comment через конструктор") k init, depot
